meanings.definition: The act of creating or forming phrases.
meanings.sent1: Her phrasemaking during the speech was impressive.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the phrasemaking in poetry.
meanings.sent3: The phrasemaking in the song made me smile.
meanings.sent4: His phrasemaking was like painting with words.
meanings.sent5: The art of phrasemaking can be learned with practice.
